text:
The binary distribution build and install scripts do not do path replacements 
on ssl.conf or highperformance.conf, i.e. they only handle httpd.conf.

This forces manual edits (or tweaks to these files in the binary distributable) 
to get ssl and highperformance configurations working when the installation is 
done at a path other than /usr/local/apache2.
creator: jessh@ptc.com
